text: Anil Baijal is a retired Indian Administrative Service officer and politician. In December 2016, he became the 21st Lieutenant Governor of Delhi. He took over office on 31 December 2016 after the sudden resignation of Najeeb Jung. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Lieutenant Governors of Delhi Category:Alumni of the University of East Anglia
title: Anil Baijal
